bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum disc, fully-manipulated tubing w/ smooth welds, Compliance Plus seatstays, 1-1/8" lower bearing

components.description: Specialized disc FACT carbon monocoque w/ Zertz inserts, alloy steerer/crown, fender fittings
1-1/8" sealed Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 20mm alloy cone spacer, w/ 20mm of spacers
Specialized Elite-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt, 31.8mm clamp
Specialized Roubaix, w/ 2.5mm gel pads, bar shapers
FSA, square taper, sealed cartridge bearings
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Espoir Sport, 60TPI, wire bead, double BlackBelt protection, 700x30c
Specialized Espoir Sport, 60TPI, wire bead, double BlackBelt protection, 700x30c
Body Geometry Riva Plus, Cr-Mo rails, 143mm
Chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owner's manual
